meanings.definition: A person who intensely dislikes or loathes something.
meanings.sent1: The detesters of spicy food always choose mild options.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a detesters of horror movies.
meanings.sent3: The detesters of vegetables had a hard time at the salad bar.
meanings.sent4: The detesters of early mornings cringed at the sound of the alarm.
meanings.sent5: The detesters of rainy days preferred to stay indoors.

meanings.definition: To feel intense dislike or hatred towards something.
meanings.sent1: He detesters cleaning his room and always puts it off.
meanings.sent2: She detesters when people talk loudly on their phones in public.
meanings.sent3: The cat detesters baths and hides whenever the water comes near.
meanings.sent4: The detective detesters criminals who think they can outsmart the law.
meanings.sent5: The student detesters pop quizzes and always feels anxious about them.
